title: Errol Flynn: The Untold Story
description: Errol Flynn could have been tried for treason. The world-famous star could have ended his life on the hangman's noose. In this astonishing statement, best-selling author Charles Higham sums up a theme of his major new biography of the superstar. Behind the fame, the magical movie career that made Flynn a symbol of heroism and patriotic adventure, there was a hidden horrifying he was a spy for the gestapo, working in harness with a leading SS man, Dr. Hermann F. Erben.
author: Charles Higham
